page.title: 06TRAFFIC AROUND COWBIT
page.content: The traffic in Cowbit is very mild especially on a Thursday because it is half day closing in Spalding. On the main road through Cowbit there are more cars than lorries but in the village there are more farm vehicles. The bus service through the village is very poor and the last bus on a Saturday night is 19.22hrs. On a Thursday there are more lorries going towards Spalding than Peterborough. We think this is because the Spalding shops are stocking up. Each week day at 15.30hrs the cars and push bikes increase with the collection of children from school at the end of the day. On the main road there is a speed limit of 40 mph even so some motorists ignore this and the safety of children riding on bikes.
